titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the 17. of Nouember An. 1589 Inioyfull remembrance and thanksgiuing vnto God, for the peaceable yeres of her maiesties most gratious raigne ouer vs, now 32. By Thomas White professor in Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, ca. 1550-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [H. Bynneman for] Robert Robinson and Thomas Newman,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
